name: GEO Puzzle: Wunder Natur: Echter Puzzlespass fuer Unterwegs
overview: With the Puzzle series, Tivola has brought a real novelty to the Nintendo DS. Now follows with "Puzzle GEO - Wunder Natur" a collection of impressive nature motifs, selected in cooperation with the magazine GEO. There are 25 motifs (including volcanic eruptions, hummingbirds and icebergs) to choose from. Features: Mobile gaming fun without limits: puzzle anywhere and anytime In cooperation with the magazine GEO (Publisher: Gruner + Jahr) Impressive animal and nature pictures 25 different motifs Three levels of difficulty If you are looking for a challenge, try the time game mode Never lose puzzle pieces again
